oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_agrarian_upbringing = {
    leader_class = scientist
    trait_is_crisis_faction_check = no
    trait_is_wilderness_check = no
    has_global_flag = game_started
    exists = owner
    owner = { country_uses_food  =  yes  } 
}

    leader_class = scientist
    has_base_skill >= 4
    has_paragon_dlc = yes
    trait_is_wilderness_check = no
    exists = owner
    owner = { OR  = { is_gestalt  = yes  has_technology  =  tech_robotic_workers  } } 
}

oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_expertise_archaeostudies = {
    leader_class = scientist
    is_specialist_researcher_society = no
    can_leader_get_council_trait_trigger = yes
    has_ancrel = yes
    exists = owner
    owner = { OR  = { has_origin  =  origin_remnants   has_ascension_perk  =  ap_archaeoengineers   any_system_within_border  = { any_archaeological_site  = { is_site_completed  = yes } }  any_owned_planet  = { has_active_building  =  building_archaeostudies_faculty  } } } 
}
